structured.description: A class `WebCreateTodoCommand` that represents a command for creating a new todo item on a web application. The class has two instance fields: `id` and `description`, which are used to store the unique identifier and text description of the todo item, respectively. The class also has two methods: `getId()` and `getDescription()`, which return the values of `id` and `description`, respectively.

items.description: is a Java object that represents a command for creating a new to-do item. It has two private fields: `id` and `description`, which are set in the constructor when the command is created. The `getId()` and `getDescription()` methods return the values of these fields.
items.name: WebCreateTodoCommand

items.description: returns the `id` field of an object.

returns.description: a string representation of the `id` variable.

items.name: getId

items.description: returns a string representing the description associated with an object.

returns.description: a string representing the function's description.

usage.code:
WebCreateTodoCommand command = new WebCreateTodoCommand("1234", "Buy milk");
String description = command.getDescription(); // returns "Buy milk"

items.name: getDescription

structured.description: A class called AddProductCommand, which is used to add a product to an aggregate entity. The class has fields for the product's ID and name, and provides methods for retrieving the product's ID and name. The class also uses the Axon framework's @TargetAggregateIdentifier annotation to specify the aggregate identifier for the product.

items.description: is a Java class that defines a command to add a product to an aggregate identifier. The class has two instance variables: id and name, which are used to identify the product being added. The class also has two methods: getId() and getName(), which return the value of the id and name respectively.
items.name: AddProductCommand

items.description: retrieves the `id` field of an object and returns its value as a string.

returns.description: a string representing the value of the `id` field.

items.name: getId

returns.description: a string representing the name of the object.
